issue.title: [C++][FlightRPC] Fix Flight SQL's ColumnMetadata constructor visibility
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16049](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16049). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
User should be able to get a ColumnMetadata object from a `std::shared_ptr<const arrow::KeyValueMetadata>` object, but the
constructor was not public to do so.
